description: Eating your greens has never been easier with these moreish curried kale crisps.
keywords: Chips & fries,Pescatarian,Seafood free,Egg free,Halal,Soy free,Wheat free,Vegetarian,Vegan,Dairy free,Peanut free
name: Curried Kale Crisps Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Pre-heat the oven to 160°C/140°C fan-forced. Line a baking sheet with parchment paper.
Tear the kale into medium pieces, place in a large bowl and pour over the oil. Massage the oil into the kale leaves with your hands.
Whisk the dry ingredients together in a small bowl then sprinkle on the kale, mixing well to coat every leaf with spice mix.
Lay the kale leaves in a single layer on the baking sheet, bake for 10 minutes, rotate the baking sheet and bake for 8 more minutes before serving.
